import React, { useContext } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { Panel, PanelHeader, PanelHeaderBack } from "@vkontakte/vkui"; import "./Offers.css"; import logo from "../../img/SmartMoneyLogo.png"; import Back from "../../img/chevron-back.svg"; import cardLogoZaimer from "../../img/zaimer.png"; import cardLogoMoneyMan from "../../img/moneyman.jpg"; import cardLogoWebBankir from "../../img/webbankir-logo.jpg"; import highChance from "../../img/highChance.svg"; import delimeter from "../../img/delimeter.svg"; import { useCollectionData } from "react-firebase-hooks/firestore"; import firebase from "firebase/compat"; import { Context } from "../.."; const Offers = ({ go, id, rngValue, group }) => { const { firestore } = useContext(Context); const [messages1] = useCollectionData(firestore.collection("129542706")); const [messages2] = useCollectionData(firestore.collection("55652521")); const [messages3] = useCollectionData(firestore.collection("42172377")); const messages = [messages1, messages2, messages3]; console.log(messages); let result = []; const createRate = async () => { for (let i = 0; i < messages?.length; i++) { let summ = 0; for (let j = 0; j < messages[i]?.length; j++) { summ += messages[i][j]?.rating; if (j == messages[i]?.length - 1) { result.push((summ / messages[i]?.length).toFixed(1)); } } } console.log(result); }; // for (let i = 0; i < messages?.length; i++) { // k += messages[i].rating; // } createRate(); return (

); }; Offers.propTypes = { id: PropTypes.string.isRequired, go: PropTypes.func.isRequired, }; export default Offers;
